p: The total concentration of both phenylpropanoid glycosides ranged from 6766.21 mg/100 g DW (4.5 g of inoculum) through 7109.61 mg/100 g DW (1.5 g of inoculum), to the maximum of 7446.56 mg/100 g DW (3.0 g of inoculum). The amount of inoculum found to be optimal for the production of these two compounds was 3.0 g ( Table 1).
